sentences: Clarisse Leite Dias Baptista (January 11, 1917 – May 11, 2003) was a Brazilian composer, pianist and music educator.
She was born in São Paulo and studied in São Paulo and France.
After completing her studies, she worked as a professor of music at Academia Internacional, Rio de Janeiro.
Suite Nordestina (1971) including 1) Baticum, 2) Prece por Maria Bonita (A Prayer to Maria Bonita) and 3) Jacunços (Gunmen)
